mapper.sql: select id, user_id, house_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from user_follow
mapper.select:
select uf.id, house_id, uf.create_time,hc.name communityName,hh.* from user_follow uf left join hse_house hh on uf.house_id = hh.id left join hse_community hc on hh.community_id = hc.id
uf.user_id = #{userId} and uf.is_deleted = 0 and hh.is_deleted = 0 and hc.is_deleted = 0
order by uf.id desc
mapper.update: update user_follow set is_deleted =1 where id =#{id}
